about_the_game:
Just shake the succubus' boobs to the rhythm!
Will you get a reward or death?
This is a boob rhythm game that is also compatible with VR.

If you make her feel good, her sensitivity level will increase!


Depending on the sensitivity, you can take off her clothes and get more rewards in the reward time!


This game is a rhythm game in which you rub the devil girl's boobs to the rhythm and beat her nipples.
When you clear the game, you can see sex scenes.
Depending on the result of the game, the girl's likability will increase and the positions of the sex scene will be released.

On the other hand, if you fail to clear the game, the capricious girl will kill you.
Dead or Fuck? Make the girl happy with your technique!


--Features--
Full 3D model animation
Full voice
Subtitle support
Number of songs: 3 songs x 5 difficulty levels

name: Boob Shaker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • VR Support: OpenXR－HTC Vive Cosmos、HTC Vive、Oculus CV1、Meta Quest 2、Oculus Rift S
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10/11
  • VR Support: OpenXR－HTC Vive Cosmos、HTC Vive、Oculus CV1、Meta Quest 2、Oculus Rift S

short_description: Shake the succubus' boobs to the rhythm! Will you get a reward or death? A boobie rhythm game for both VR and PC.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
